name: Paused
description:
You should never need luck. But you may need to PAUSE and think to make the correct choice.

Paused is a short puzzle game I put together for the Cyberpunk jam. It may feel more like a quick tech demo/proof-of-concept than a complete game but I hope you still enjoy it.

Controls

wasd = move

spacebar = jump

mouse = look

left click = interact (terminals will glow when in range)

esc = pause/unpause

h = toggle help display while paused

Updates

v1.1 (2014-03-12)

  • Start the player slightly higher to fix ocasional cases of the player falling through the floor at start
  • The p key can now also be used to pause the game, which shouldn't undo cursor lock like the escape key.

v1.2 (2014-03-17)

  • Adjusted some text to better hint at the solution
  • Some more tweaks to hopefully fix issues with some players falling through the floor at the start
